DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate quantitative qualitative toxicity oxaliplatin combine fluorouracil leucovorin calcium patient advance adenocarcinoma colon rectum . OUTLINE : Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV 10-20 minute follow within 10 minute fluorouracil IV bolus day 1 , 8 , 15 , 29 , 36 , 43 . Patients receive oxaliplatin IV 2 hour prior leucovorin calcium fluorouracil day 1 , 15 , 29 , 43 . Treatment repeat every 8 week 3 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients stable respond disease may receive additional course upon approval sponsor . Patients follow 30 day . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-35 patient accrue study .
